Workflow.Name: BACore | Runtime - Start Stage
Workflow.Description: Cloud flow that processes each Stage for a workflow process at runtime. This is triggered when a workflow creates a Stage instance. This cloud flow will create a Node instance according to the Nodes defined in the stage.

Description.description: Cloud flow that processes each Stage for a workflow process at runtime. This is triggered when a workflow creates a Stage instance. This cloud flow will create a Node instance according to the Nodes defined in the stage.
